content.description: Stand start at the head height jug. Climb up the shallow left facing corner to the flake on the lip
content.protection: Many pads and spotters. There is a huge scary block near the landing of this problem.

content.description: Start low matched on the sloper. Make a couple short moves to pull over the lip, and then walk up the arete.
content.location: This is the right most route on the face of the Swamp 2 boulder. Sudden Death is about 5 feet to the left.

content.description: Climb the left rising seam above the low sloping slab. Top out in the sometimes dirty crack.
content.protection: Despite its name, this climb is relatively safe compared to its neighbor V-diculous. Still use a good number of pads and spotters to avoid catching your feet on the low slab and stuff like that.

content.description: Easy cruise to top of a large boulder. Step onto the slab several feet left of Two-Pack Shacker, then work your way right to the arête. Climb to the top on the rock just left of the arête. Beware of loose holds near the top. Also used to get off the boulder.
This is the "third" boulder in the Second Set. It has 7 problem on it. Some of the landings on this boulder are scary, but a few of the climbs are well worth protecting properly to try.
